tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Lineups (
    lineup_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    festival_id INT,
    lineup_date DATE,
    headliner VARCHAR(255),
    total_artists INT
);

CREATE TABLE Performances (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lineup_id INT,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    stage VARCHAR(255),
    artist_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE Collaborations (
    collaboration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artist_id1 INT,
    artist_id2 INT,
    collaboration_date DATE,
    song_title VARCHAR(255),
    rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE festival (
    festival_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    festival_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    festival_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    festival_start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    festival_end_date DATE NOT NULL
);
